issue.title: Set bitbucket build status for default and release branch builds

content.raw: I think that it should not be very hard to change the bitjen server to respond not only to `pull_request` events but also to  `commits` and `new branches`. The main reason I did not do it in the past was because the gazebo build was the main development point and the cycle there is taking more than 1 hour (in the good old days we only had one GPU per distro). I think that these conditions have changed today and we have space to at least react to commits and new branches in most of our different libraries. So green light by my side, I need to find some time to implement it (probably a couple of days).
